column1: The Comb and Wattle Inn is a tavern in the village of Combe in Bree-land in The Lord of the Rings Online.
Lizbeth Honeymeade is the proprietor of the Comb and Wattle Inn
column5: and other consumables. Local ruffians can usually be seen patronizing the humble tavern.
